name: How come
description: is used to ask sb the reason of smth
examples: How come he gets away the everything?
How come I ran out of fuel?
How come they have called off our weekly meeting?

name: should have V3
examples: I should have turned down that job offer.
I shouldn't have give up my driving courses.
He should have settled down 2 months go.
